description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

validation_rules: hasCountOfNotNull({dummy_sp1, dummy_sp2, dummy_sp3, dummy_sp4, dummy_sp5}, {dummy_u1, dummy_u2}, 1, 'FALSE'|NOT_APPLICABLE)
translation_rules: ifElseCountOfNotNullText({dummy_sp1, dummy_sp2, dummy_sp3, dummy_sp4, dummy_sp5}, {dummy_u1, dummy_u2}, 2, 1, 'S', 'M')
description: Validation catches rows with no forest info and returns NOT_APPLICABLE. Translation runs countOfNotNull for the two forest layers. If one layer, returns S, if two layers returns M.

translation_rules: countOfNotNull({dummy_sp1, dummy_sp2, dummy_sp3, dummy_sp4, dummy_sp5}, {dummy_u1, dummy_u2}, {dummy_np}, 3, 'TRUE')
description: Count layers up to max of 3. Layers are the canopy species, understory species, and non-forest types. Zero counted as null for non-forest codes.
